pages.text: $(li)The Shiba is a new friendly dog that can be found in the Mountains of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They can be tamed with Bones and interacted in the same way that regular Wolves.
They will also lay down if you're having them sit on a bed!
$(li)Wolves also fetch any Arrows or Tridents after they land and bring them back to you.
$(li)If you are holding a Torch, Shibas will also look for dark spots and get mad at them.
